WRITING.TEXT: Hi everyone, I have been looking through this subreddit on and off and decided I would try dropping all my games. I wouldn't say I have terrible addiction problems, just that I have wasted so much time playing games and I have no real hobbies or interests. Wish me luck

WRITING.TITLE: Question about youtube
WRITING.TEXT: What do you guys do about watching youtube, I am not watching gaming videos and the videos I am watching are more educational ones I suppose but sitting here watching youtube doesn't seem that much better than gaming. cheers
Wow you summed up how I feel pretty well...
Yep it #8217;s about all I do
I also find myself just listening to videos while I #8217;m trying to sleep or do anything really. Idk I think it #8217;s comforting to just listen to someone talking

While I agree with a lot of what you said and the comments as well. I think it #8217;s still important to acknowledge that some people might still be depressed just not as severely. This doesn #8217;t make it any less of an issue, they just might not understand how much worse it could be

Yes I agree with that, there are definitely people who are not depressed and just get sad about something and say that they are #8216;depressed #8217;. But that doesn #8217;t mean that those with less severe legitimate depression don #8217;t deserve help

WRITING.TITLE: Feeling like depression is my fault
WRITING.TEXT: Do some of you feel like its your fault your depressed or that you should just be stronger and get over it. Cause I feel like I fake my depression to make an excuse for laziness. So how can you actual tell the difference?

I'm sorry to head about that, I would definitely talk to your therapist about it. Even if you think you deserve to feel bad, we all make mistakes and maybe you should be a bit nicer to yourself. I've had similar things happen where I disappear for a while because of depression and ignore everything from everyone feeling they would be better off without me, then one person got really mad about me ignoring her so idk
yeah for sure
Happy birthday! Keep fighting hard bro :)
I 100% relate to this, I #8217;m glad to see there are others experiencing this. I guess it #8217;s just part of the whole guilt that depressed people often feel
Exact same thing happened to me, shit hurts :(

WRITING.TITLE: When do mood swings occur for people?
WRITING.TEXT: Do your mood swings between hypomania and depression happen gradually over a couple days or is it like an overnight transition?

WRITING.TITLE: What do people do with their time
WRITING.TEXT: What does everyone do when they are depressed and really have no interest in anything, i just end up watching random YouTube videos all day
Yep, I feel like my few friends hate me and just pretend to like me cause they don #8217;t wanna be nasty

WRITING.TITLE: My depression seems silly
WRITING.TEXT: Does anyone else feel really silly about their depression? Like when I try to explain how I feel to my parents for example, I immediately feel really silly for feeling how I do and that I #8217;m just lazy and useless
Yeah I get that, I think at this point my parents are just sick off me doing nothing, would be better if I wasn't around
Yeah they know but I don #8217;t think they understand it properly, they just tell me to force myself to do stuff. Which if it was that simple no one would have issues with depression
Yeah it #8217;s all I do, sad existence
I feel this. Some people will wanna give you support and all but at the end of the day depressed people are no fun to be around and I understand that

WRITING.TITLE: How often does hypomania occur for people
WRITING.TEXT: Hi, I #8217;m possibly facing a diagnosis of bipolar type 2 and I #8217;m trying to better understand it. For most people how frequently do you have hypomania episodes and how often do you cycle between it and depression. Thanks
Wow this is so true for me it hurts
Yeah for me I just have no motivation whatsoever to do anything. Only thing I still somewhat enjoy is playing games
Yes this exact thing happened to me and I felt so good after
